name: Party Time
description:
#WeeklyGameJam
Week 71 Theme: 'Punk's Not Dead'

Hi, looking for the topic I found a video of a punk party that impressed me and try to simulate in this game. You can find the video by looking for " Punk dance". I hope you like it, any suggestion is welcome.

To move, use "wasd" or the arrows. If you leave the circle, you lose. How long do you stay inside?
